vote.title: To amend the 2022 Capital Improvement Budget; to authorize the transfer of cash and appropriation between projects within the Storm Sewers Bond Fund; to authorize the City Attorney to spend up to $100,000.00 from the Storm Sewers Bond Fund to acquire and accept in good faith certain fee simple and lesser real estate located in the vicinity of Postlewaite Road and contract for associated professional services in order for the Department of Public Utilities to timely complete the acquisition of Real Estate for the Postlewaite Road Stormwater System Improvements project. ($100,000.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
